Detailed Description

Provides an extended color matrix, offering methods to handle most common tasks.

int  x,
int  y,
MatrixOrder  order = MatrixOrderPrepend 
) [protected]

Rotate the matrix about a color axis.

Note:
The color of the axis is unchanged, while the others are rotated in color space.

Status AggOO::ColorMatrixExt::SetSaturation ( REAL  sat,
MatrixOrder  order = MatrixOrderPrepend 
)

Set the saturation of the matrix

Remarks:
Saturation of 0.0 yields black & white, 1.0 is neutral.

Status AggOO::ColorMatrixExt::RotateHue ( REAL  phi  ) 

Rotate the hue about the gray axis

Remarks:
Luminance is fixed, other colors are rotated.

Status AggOO::ColorMatrixExt::SetTint ( REAL  phi,
REAL  amount 
)

Scale the tint

Parameters:
phi [-180..180, 0 = blue]
amount [-1.0..1.0, 0 = neutral]
